## Table of Score Distribution

This is a demo of parallel comparison of scoring efficiency of Lakers against its opponents with features as below:

- Capsules show the total score of the matches
- Tooltips, when hovering on the symbol, show the distribution of scores by period

```{r charts, echo=FALSE}
params$dt
```
